title: ECS task exited during runtime
what_broke: A running ECS task stopped unexpectedly (simulated container failure).
impact: Service briefly had zero healthy targets, leading to short unavailability.
detection_detail: CloudWatch alarm (or service health signal) detected task count/health degradation.
healing_detail: ECS Service Scheduler launched a replacement task automatically; ALB health checks returned healthy.
learning: Resilience comes from health checks + desired state reconciliation. MTTR is measurable even in small failures.
